content: elon stargazer -the very curious cat designed by payton sage november 11 2019© this little cat is not like some of his friends instead of mice he likes to chase 1 stars for elon stargazer even the sky is not the limit materials red heart comfort yarn silver and small amount of black safety eyes 3mm crochet hook fiberfill cat - head - starting at nose 1 mc single_crochet x6 6 2 increase around 12 3 single_crochet increase around 18 4 single_crochet increase single_crochet x2 increase x5 single_crochet 24 5 single_crochet around 24 x2 row 7 increase single_crochet x2 around 32 8 single_crochet x3 increase around 40 9 single_crochet x9 increase single_crochet x3 increase *single_crochet x3* increase single_crochet increase single_crochet increase *scx3* increase single_crochet x3 increase single_crochet x9 increase 48 *eyes will go into row indent right above middle stitch of each marked group* 10 single_crochet around 48 x2 row 12 single_crochet x8 decrease single_crochet x4 decrease single_crochet x16 decrease single_crochet x4 decrease single_crochet x8 44 13 single_crochet around 44 x6 row *don t forget to attach safety eyes on marked stitch as above* 19 single_crochet x9 decrease around 40 2 20 single_crochet x6 decrease around 35 21 single_crochet x5 decrease around 30 22 single_crochet x2 decrease single_crochet x4 decrease x4 single_crochet x2 25 23 decrease single_crochet x3 decrease x4 single_crochet x3 20 > stuff firmly and continue to do so until closing 24 single_crochet x2 decrease around 15 25 single_crochet decrease around 10 finish off leave tail long enough to weave through remaining stitches and pull closed secure and weave in end 3 cat - ears - make 2 1 mc single_crochet x6 2 single_crochet x6 3 increase single_crochet x2 x2 8 4 increase single_crochet x3 x2 10 5 increase single_crochet x4 x2 12 6 increase single_crochet x5 x2 14 7 increase single_crochet x6 x2 16 8 increase single_crochet x7 x2 18 9 increase x2 single_crochet x6 increase x3 single_crochet x6 increase 24 10 single_crochet x1 increase single_crochet x11 increase single_crochet x10 26 fo leave tail for sewing after completing ears sew to head i stitched around eyes to make them less out there and sewed a nose and mouth on with black yarn to pull the eyes in stitch from one to the other in body yarn and pull until desired look do the same with the nose and mouth 4 cat - front foot/leg - left and right - ***make before cat body as they will be crocheted into the body as you go *** note when crocheting the toe or thumb stitch use only the 2 front loops of the half_double_crochet from previous row toe st -the toe stitch is just a puff variant-* yo insert hook yo pull through continuing in same stitch repeat*x3 9 loops on hook yo pull through all 9 loops chain 1 thumb st -the thumb stitch is another variant of the puff- yo insert hook yo 5 pull through x2 yo pull through all 7 loops chain 1 1 mc
